<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Graydirge](/Articles.aspx?ID=64)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 64</row>

Humans and undead rub shoulders in bone-shrouded Graydirge. Explore the town's many sites and secrets!
name: Graydirge
